title: Exploring the relationship between pyroptosis and inflammatory bone loss: Evidence from a cigarette smoke-induced osteoporosis mouse model
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Guang Wang, Hongming Li, Xinyue Hu, Yiyi Wang, Guoqiang Zhu, Hongliang Zhou, Zilin Liang, Zhenxing Wang, Andreas Nuessler, Zhangyuan Lin, Hui Xie, Sheng Zhu
